feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: From all that I can collect by your manner of talking, you must be two of the silliest girls in the country. I have suspected it some time, but I am now convinced.

feels.name: Astonishment
feels.quote: Miss Elizabeth Bennet! I am all astonishment. How long has she been such a favourite? and pray when am I to wish you joy?

causedByEvent.name: Mr. Darcy mentioning Miss Elizabeth Bennet

hasObject.name: Mr. Darcy mentioning Miss Elizabeth Bennet

feels.name: Interest
feels.quote: He began to wish to know more of her; and, as a step towards conversing with her himself, attended to her conversation with others.

causedByEvent.name: Wishing to know more about Miss Elizabeth Bennet
